Serumkind Chaga Charging Drop Serum

Brand: SerumKind

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, BETAINE, INONOTUS OBLIQUUS (MUSHROOM) EXTRACT, SODIUM CARBOMER, THEOBROMA CACAO (COCOA) SEED EXTRACT, SODIUM POLYACRYLATE, DEXTRIN, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, ADENOSINE, ZINGIBER OFFICINALE (GINGER) RO

FICINALE (GINGER) ROOT EXTRACT, SCHISANDRA CHINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT, TOCOPHEROL

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
